item.title: Hello, world
item.description:
So, I guess this is another attempt at a website. I need one a bit more now, due to wanting to share some information on my peering setup.

For the site, I’m using the static site generator hugo along with some tricks with Github Actions, Github Pages, and a reverse proxy to host everything on my own domain name without having to pay for things.

Should you want to set up a similar thing, the repositories are open.
